sections.heading: to 61-21-37 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1978, ch. 185, § 26, repealed former 67-20-1 to 67-20-33, 1953 Comp. (61-21-1 to 61-21-37 NMSA 1978), relating to embalmers and funeral directors, effective July 1, 1978. For provisions of the Thanatopractice Act,see61-32-1 NMSA 1978 et seq.
